txt.en: 'Come, good [placeholder], sit by the fire. Your clothes won't dishevel, your feet will not tire.'
'The yellow leaves will brush your cheeks, the wind will blow your hair. Though you may enter with troubles a-plenty you will leave without a care.'
'[placeholder] has come to the valley. What business have you for the Master of The Last Homely House?'
'To dance with the breeze? To stand in the water? To stand in the trees? To gaze on the daughter? Why has [placeholder] come?'
